data.productDescription: Custom aluminum brackets for payload assembly

/construction-manufacturing/order-reques.prompt:
Fill out the order request form with this information:  
Company: Orion Aerospace  
Customer number: OR-55821  
Product type: custom  
Product description: Custom aluminum brackets for payload assembly  
Quantity: 500  
Required date: 2025‑05‑20  
Shipping method: express  

Attach the file **/srv/manufacturing/orion-aerospace/drawings/bracket_drawings.dwg** as the drawing.  
Attach **/srv/manufacturing/orion-aerospace/specs/spec_appendix.pdf** and **/srv/manufacturing/orion-aerospace/safety/msds.pdf** in “additional docs”.  

Leave the remaining fields blank.  

Then submit the form.

data.productDescription: Insulated duct panels for air distribution

- Customer number: NW-12007
- Product type: standard
- Product description: Insulated duct panels for air distribution
- Quantity: 80
- Required date: 2025-07-01
- Shipping method: ground
- Attach the /srv/manufacturing/northwind-hvac/drawings/duct_panel_layout.dwg drawing.
- Attach the /srv/manufacturing/northwind-hvac/docs/install_guide.pdf file in “additional docs”.
Leave the remaining fields blank and then submit the form.

data.serviceDescription: Build and maintain internal web portals

/legal-compliance/contractor-onboarding.prompt:
Fill out the service agreement form with this information:
- Full name: Taylor Morgan  
- Email: taylor@morgandev.example  
- Phone: +1-415-555-0119  
- Tax ID: 12-3456789  
- Business type: llc  
- Service description: Build and maintain internal web portals  
- Start date: 2025-02-01  

Attach the **/home/tmorgan/Documents/Taxes/w9_taylor_morgan.pdf** file for the W‑9 form.  
Attach the **/home/tmorgan/Documents/Insurance/morgan_llc_insurance.pdf** file for the insurance certificate.  
Attach the **/home/tmorgan/Documents/Licenses/engineering_license.pdf** file for the license certificate.  

Check “Terms agreed” and “Confidentiality agreed”.  

Leave the remaining fields blank.  

Then submit the form.

Fill out the form with this information:  
Full name: Jasmine Park  
Business name: leave blank  
Email: jasmine@parkux.example  
Phone: +1-415-555-0130  
Tax ID: 98‑7654321  
Business type: soleProprietor  
Service description: Redesign member mobile app flows  
Start date: 2025‑09‑15  
End date: leave blank  

Attach the W‑9 form located at “/home/jasmine/Documents/Taxes/w9_jasmine_park.pdf”.  
Attach the insurance certificate located at “/home/jasmine/Documents/Insurance/parkux_liability_cert.pdf”.  
Attach the license certificate located at “/home/jasmine/Documents/Licenses/uxp_license.pdf”.  

Mark both “Terms agreed” and “Confidentiality agreed” as on.  

Leave the remaining fields blank, then submit the form.
